prompts: Create a Bug-type Pokemon with blue and purple wings and a charming personality.
I want a whimsical Pokemon that flutters through forests, showcasing colorful patterns.
Generate a creature with graceful wings that can blend into flower gardens.
Make an enchanting Pokemon inspired by butterflies, using soft pastel colors and delicate features.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in sunny meadows, with vibrant colors and a gentle demeanor.
Design a flying Pokemon that can dazzle opponents with its beautiful wing patterns.
Show me a peaceful Bug-type that loves to sip nectar from flowers in lush habitats.
